title: Cluster Spacecraft 4 FluxGate Magnetometer (FGM) Spin-Resolution Parameters - Andre Balogh>a.balogh@imperial.ac.uk & Elizabeth Lucek>e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk & ESA CAA (Imperial College)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'time_tags__C4_CP_FGM_SPIN' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/cluster/c4/cp/2001/c4_cp_fgm_spin_20010131_v01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 58.9082% of the 12518 timesteps. Cadence = 4008 [ms] = PT4.008S.
